assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This article does not contain any research with human or animal subjects performed by the any of the authors. Ethics approval was not required for this public engagement exercise as data collected during town hall sessions are “provided without any identifier or group of identifiers which would allow attribution of private information to an individual” Memorial University, Health Research Ethics Board ExternalRef removed. However, this engagement work followed the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.
